caption.p: Composite sea-surface temperature anomalies for high and low local dimension. Composite sea-surface temperature anomalies (units: K) with respect to the climatological seasonal cycles for days with d SST above ( a, c, e) and below ( b, d, f) the respective median values. Datasets: COBE, as used in 20CRv2c ( a, b), ERA20CM ( c, d) and CERA20C ( e, f)
